communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

PLEASE PROVIDE ME WITH THE OFFENSE REPORT TO INCLUDE THE INVOLVED PARTIES FOR THE SHOOTING THAT OCCURED AT THE INDIGO HOTEL LOCATED AT 211 CLAY AVENUE IN WACO TEXAS ON 07/15/2023. ALSO PLEASE PROVIDE ME WITH COPIES OF THE 911 AUDIO RECORDINGS THAT ARE ASSOCIATED WITH THIS INCIDENT AS WELL.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Requesting all text messages between Board Member Mariela Estrada and the following individuals, for the timeframe July 18, 2021 2023 through July 21, 2023:

Mayor Brandon Johnson

Please note: This seeks texts she sent to Mayor Johnson, any texts Mayor Johnson sent her, and any group chat texts including Board Member Estrada and the mayor. This also includes any messages sent through WhatsApp, Signal, or any other text messaging apps.

Also note: This request seeks texts sent and received by the Board Member whether they were sent on personal or CPS-issued cellphones or any other device.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Requesting all text messages between Board Member Tanya Woods and the following individuals, for the timeframe July 18, 2021 2023 through July 21, 2023:

Board President Shi

Please note: This seeks texts she sent to Board President Shi, any texts Board President Shi sent her, and any group chat texts including Woods and the Board President Shi. This also includes any messages sent through WhatsApp, Signal, or any other text messaging apps.

Also note: This request seeks texts sent and received by the Board Member whether they were sent on personal or CPS-issued cellphones or any other device.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani
